## docs package

Tool + CLI for docs generation from TSDocs

## Remarks

### Templates

Site pages includes the following templates from docs-config:

- index.md - main page header

- package.md - packages root page header

- item.md - header for other files

### Macros

There are many awesome macros you can use in your TDDocs. Using macros look like this `[[[macro and args]]]`

[![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/@wixc3%2Fdocs.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/js/@wixc3%2Fdocs)
[@wixc3/docs on Github](https://github.com/wixplosives/core3-utils/tree/master/packages/docs)

## docs-macros package

## Variables

| Variable                                                                                         | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [github](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs-macros.github)                           | <p>A link to the package on github</p><p>Usage: inside a ts-docs comment block:</p><p><code>[[[github caption?]]]</code></p>                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [githubBuildStatus](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs-macros.githubbuildstatus)     | <p>A github build status badge</p><p>Usage: inside a ts-docs comment block:</p><p><code>[[[githubBuildStatus]]]</code></p>                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [githubPages](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs-macros.githubpages)                 | <p>A link to the project's github pages</p><p>Usage: inside a ts-docs comment block:</p><p><code>[[[githubPages uri? caption?]]]</code></p><p>where uri can be an inner page</p><p>if caption is provided a markdown link will be created, otherwise the raw root URL will replace the macro</p> |
| [gitRepo](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs-macros.gitrepo)                         | <p>Project's current package name, in a url friendly format</p><p>Usage: inside a ts-docs comment block:</p><p><code>[[[gitRepo field?]]]</code></p><p>where field can be: host \| org \| repo \| pages \| github</p>                                                                            |
| [h](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs-macros.h)                                     | <p>Heading - since ts-docs to not natively allow for markdown formatting, this macro is used to create a \#, \#\#, \#\# etc</p><p>Usage: inside a ts-docs comment block:</p><p><code>[[[h level title]]]</code></p>                                                                              |
| [include](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs-macros.include)                         | <p>Include another markdown file (that may also have macros)</p><p>Usage: inside a ts-docs comment block:</p><p><code>[[[include path]]]</code></p>                                                                                                                                              |
| [listMacros](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs-macros.listmacros)                   | <p>Lists all the available macros</p><p>Usage: inside a ts-docs comment block:</p><p><code>[[[listMacros]]]</code></p>                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [npmBadge](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs-macros.npmbadge)                       | <p>A npm version badge</p><p>Usage: inside a ts-docs comment block:</p><p><code>[[[npmBadge]]]</code></p>                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [packageName](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs-macros.packagename)                 | <p>Project's current package name</p><p>Usage: inside a ts-docs comment block of a package:</p><p><code>@wixc3/docs</code></p><p>Will be replace by the full package name, i.e <code>@wixc3/docs-macros</code></p>                                                                               |
| [packageNameUrl](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs-macros.packagenameurl)           | <p>Project's current package name, in a url friendly format</p><p>Usage: inside a ts-docs comment block of a package:</p><p><code>[[[packageNameUrl]]]</code></p><p>This is useful for generating links and badges</p>                                                                           |
| [rootPackageName](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs-macros.rootpackagename)         | <p>Project's root package name</p><p>Usage: inside a ts-docs comment block:</p><p><code>[[[rootPackageName]]]</code></p>                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [unscopedPackageName](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs-macros.unscopedpackagename) | <p>Project's current package name, unscoped</p><p>Usage: inside a ts-docs comment block of a package: \*docs</p><p>Will be replace by the full package name, i.e <code>bla</code> for <code>@wixc3/bla</code></p>                                                                                |

## Example 1

<caption>Generate automatically updated github pages</caption>

```bash
npm i @wixc3/docs
npx docs init
git push
```

## Example 2

<caption>Build documentation locally</caption>

```bash
npx docs build
```

## Example 3

<caption>Generate README.md in all packages (after docs build)</caption>

```bash
npx docs readme
```

## Functions

| Function                                                                                     | Description                                                                                                                                                           |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [buildDocs(config, steps, macros)](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs.builddocs) | Build docs markdown                                                                                                                                                   |
| [cli()](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs.cli)                                  |                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [createReadme(config, siteUrl)](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs.createreadme) |                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [init(config, force)](https://wixplosives.github.io/core3-utils/docs.init)                   | <p>Initialize docs pre-requisites:</p><p>- Adds api-extractor.json to packages</p><p>- Adds git pages action</p><p>- Creates configs and templates in docs-config</p> |
